Lanxi county level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang

sentences.english: Today, parents have to take me to the ground floor of the long river of Lanxi play.
sentences.chinese: 今天，爸爸媽媽就要帶我去蘭溪地下長河玩。

sentences.english: More than 70 km of rural dikes are close to overflowing in the city of Lanxi.
sentences.chinese: 浙江蘭溪70餘公里農村堤防已達防禦極限。

sentences.english: Textile industry is one of the six pillar industries in Lanxi.
sentences.chinese: 紡織服裝業是蘭溪市六大支柱產業之一。
